001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriber;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberErrorLog;
008import com.exoreaction.xorcery.process.ActiveProcesses;
009import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
010import jakarta.inject.Inject;
011import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
012import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
013import org.glassfish.hk2.api.IterableProvider;
014import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
015import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
016import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
017
018import java.io.IOException;
019import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
020import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
021
022@Service(name = "persistentsubscribers")
023@RunLevel(20)
024public class PersistentSubscribersService
025        implements PreDestroy {
026
027    private final Logger logger;
028    private final ActiveProcesses activeProcesses = new ActiveProcesses();
029
030    @Inject
031    public PersistentSubscribersService(
032            Configuration configuration,
033            Logger logger,
034            LoggerContext loggerContext,
035            ReactiveStreamsClient reactiveStreamsClient,
036            IterableProvider<PersistentSubscriber> persistentSubscribers,
037            IterableProvider<PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint> checkpointProviders,
038            IterableProvider<PersistentSubscriberErrorLog> errorLogProviders) throws IOException {
039        this.logger = logger;
040
041        PersistentSubscribersConfiguration persistentSubscribersConfiguration = new PersistentSubscribersConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("persistentsubscribers"));
042
043        logger.info("Subscribers:\n{}", String.join(",", StreamSupport.stream(persistentSubscribers.spliterator(), false).map(Object::toString).toList()));
044
045        for (PersistentSubscriber persistentSubscriber : persistentSubscribers) {
046            logger.info(persistentSubscriber);
047        }
048
049        for (PersistentSubscriberConfiguration subscriberConfig : persistentSubscribersConfiguration.getPersistentSubscribers()) {
050            System.out.println(subscriberConfig.getName());
051
052            PersistentSubscriber subscriber = persistentSubscribers.named(subscriberConfig.getName()).get();
053
054            if (subscriber == null) {
055                throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Could not find persistent subscriber provider named '%s'", subscriberConfig.getName()));
056            }
057
058            subscriber.init(subscriberConfig);
059
060            String checkpointProviderName = subscriberConfig.getCheckpointProvider().orElseGet(persistentSubscribersConfiguration::getDefaultCheckpointProvider);
061            PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint checkpoint = checkpointProviders.named(checkpointProviderName).get();
062            if (checkpoint == null)
063            {
064                throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Could not find checkpoint provider named '%s'", checkpointProviderName));
065            }
066            checkpoint.init(subscriberConfig);
067
068            String errorLogProviderName = subscriberConfig.getErrorLogProvider().orElseGet(persistentSubscribersConfiguration::getDefaultErrorLogProvider);
069            PersistentSubscriberErrorLog errorLog = errorLogProviders.named(errorLogProviderName).get();
070            if (errorLog == null)
071            {
072                throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Could not find error log provider named '%s'", errorLogProviderName));
073            }
074            errorLog.init(subscriberConfig, subscriber);
075
076            CompletableFuture<Void> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
077            activeProcesses.add(new PersistentSubscriberProcess(
078                    subscriberConfig,
079                    reactiveStreamsClient,
080                    subscriber,
081                    checkpoint,
082                    errorLog,
083                    loggerContext.getLogger(PersistentSubscriberProcess.class),
084                    result
085            )).start();
086        }
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public void preDestroy() {
091        try {
092            activeProcesses.close();
093        } catch (Exception e) {
094            logger.error("Could not stop subscriber processes", e);
095        }
096    }
097}
